data.message: Kungflu, Wuhan Virus, these were just some of the many derogatory remarks that Asians have been associated with, in what seemed like attempts to put blame on them for the pandemic. It did not help that the term Chinese Virus was used disparagingly by then President of the United States, PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1, which further encouraged and fueled the use of hate speech within the country (Vang, 2020). Individuals have also been physically assaulted, with some attacks being fatal (Vang, 2020).
